title: An Act relative to retired LEOSA certified law enforcement officers

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Fattman, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1688) of Ryan C. Fattman for legislation relative to firearm purchases by retired LEOSA certified law enforcement officers.  Public Safety and Homeland Security.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security

related_entities.name: committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security
